message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[24-May-2025 06:56:32 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_learnpress_sessions ( session_id bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, session_key char(32) NOT NULL, session_value longtext NOT NULL, session_expiry bigint(20) NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY session_id (session_id), PRIMARY KEY (session_key) ) ;

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
